Package org.webcurator.ui.target.controller

Class Summary
AbstractOverrideTabHandler The abstract tab handler for handling all profile override tabs.
AbstractTargetTabHandler The Abstract base call for all the Target tab handlers.
AddParentsController This controller manages the process of adding members to a Target Group.
AQAReaderController The controller for handling the log viewer commands.
AssignToHarvesterController  
AttachmentView A Spring View implementation that generates an attachment.
ContentReaderController The controller for handling the log viewer commands.
ContentView A Spring View implementation that displays a raw content file.
CustomDepositFormController  
EditScheduleController The controller for editing a schedule.
HarvestNowController This controller is responsible for allocating a TargetInstance to a Harvest Agent immediatly.
LiveContentRetrieverController  
LogReaderController The controller for handling the log viewer commands.
LogRetrieverController Controller for retrieving a log file from the WCT core.
PermissionPopupController The controller for the permission popup view.
ProfileBasicCredentialsController The controller for handling the creation of basic form credential overrides.
ProfileFormCredentialsController The controller for form credentials profile overrides.
QueueController The controller for displaying a list of target instances and processing commands to filter the list and display the target instances.
ShowHopPathController The controller for handling the hop path viewer commands.
TabbedTargetController The controller for all Target tabs.
TabbedTargetInstanceController The controller for all target instance tabs.
TargetAccessHandler The handler for the target access tab.
TargetAnnotationHandler The handler for the target annotations tab.
TargetDescriptionHandler The handler for the target description tab.
TargetGeneralHandler The handler for the target general tab.
TargetGroupsHandler Handler for adding groups to a Target.
TargetInstanceAnnotationHandler The handler for the target instance annotations tab.
TargetInstanceDisplayHandler The handler for the target instance annotations tab.
TargetInstanceGeneralHandler The handler for the target instance general tab.
TargetInstanceLogsHandler The handler for the target instance logs tab.
TargetInstanceProfileHandler The handler for the target instance profiles tab.
TargetInstanceResultHandler The handler for the target instance results/harvests tab.
TargetInstanceStateHandler The handler for the target instance states tab.
TargetProfileHandler The handler for the target profile overrides tab.
TargetSchedulesHandler The handler for the target schedules tab.
TargetSearchController The controller for searching for Targets.
TargetSeedsHandler The handler for the target seeds handler.
 

Exception Summary
SeedLinkWrongAgencyException Thrown when you attempt to link a seed to a permission that belongs to an agency other than that which owns the target.
